string.text: Strelok. Came back from the netherworld I see. Heh, sorry for sounding so mundane about it - being shot in the gut and taking some of Doc's heavy stuff does that to you... I heard everything from Doc, so no need to explain. Are your memories back in order at least?
I am a little better; I vaguely remember you, so we've got that.

Well that's good... Listen man, I was taking up some vigilante work to pay for several months of vodka and other little pleasures. Here is the story: A few Mercs slaughtered some stalker mates of mine for no reason, turns out, it's the same Mercs that have that rare artifact your looking for! My mates are dead now, so I thought, "Why don't I teach them a thing or two about karmic justice?" Thing is, I didn't think they were affiliated to an entire bloody garrison. I was going to kill them and steal the artifact... As discreet as I was that night, they saw me, so I ran back to this hole in the ground. They're probably still laughing about it, the bastards. Do me a favor and go blow their brains out, will you? With that rare Crystal artifact they have, the eggheads in Yantar can fix up your PDA. If you're lucky, perhaps some information will be restored along with it.
Give me the coordinates and I'll go check their pockets.

Right, here they are. There's also a Freedom guy that wanted to help out 'cause his friends were the ones killed, but I haven't heard from him. Oh, before I forget: take this sniper rifle - it should work just fine for taking the pigs down. You used to like this particular shooter.
All right, this needs to be done now. I'm on my way!
Good. Come back when you are done, and don't forget the artefact!
Sure! I ll contact you as soon as I get it!
Hey man, sorry for the delay - car was being a bitch. I hope I'm not too late to the party, 'cause I want a piece of 'em too! What's the situation?
The Mercs that murdered your friends and have the Crystal artifact are in the warehouses up ahead. An entire garrison unit from the looks of it.

That won't be easy. As I see it, we need to get past the snipers in the towers and several patrols of mercs. There is a blowout expected soon, the mutants in this area are all freaked out, a whole shit load of them are heading this way! So the blowout and mutants should help create a distraction among them. Follow me in, and I'll personally find the motherfucker who did this! As payment, I'll let you keep the artifact in question. It doesn't matter to me now that the gang is dead... You take out the first sniper at the base entrance, and then we will storm in! Have some tact - use your sniper rifle and keep the noise level low.
Alright, I'm right behind you.
So did you finally get it? I hope that asshole is dead!
Not yet. I'll be back as soon as possible.
I've killed Mad Dog and got the Crystal. Contact's dead though - blowout got the best of him.
Then there's no time to lose. Bring that thing to Yantar! I'm in no condition to come with you with these meds acting up, Godspeed.
On my way!
Hey stalker! Welcome to the basement camp.
Anything else?
See you!
What do you sell?
Nothing special, actually. Medkits and bandages mostly. I'm not a gun-dealer, but I also have basic ammunition.
Why are you in such a place?

This deep in the Zone, the price for basic supplies sky rockets. Not many traders want to set up a shop in these parts. Indeed, getting supplies is a royal pain... But, I recuperate those costs with ease, plus make a nice margin.
Huh? Stand back or I'll shoot!
Whoa, calm down! I'm not a mutant... at least not yet.
A normal? Good! Can you help me out, mate? I'm in a sticky situation.
That depends on what's in it for me.

Stuff! Yeah, yeah... artifacts and sorts. I have those if you can get back my dear rifle. You see, I made the mistake of getting out of this shack... big mistake. I dropped it while escaping some critters. Please get it back! It's somewhere at the abandoned village nearby.
Alright, I'll try to find your precious rifle.
No, sorry.
Thanks! And good luck... "mate".
Tell me about...
What are you doing here?
Surviving. How do you expect me to live near others? They'll stab you in the back and dump you on a moment's notice!
Who are you?
A nobody abortion of society like most around here. Just because I have a shack doesn't make me Mr. Special.
You know anything interesting?
Look around you. That should keep you interested for the next millennia.
I wanna talk about your weapon.
Did you get it?
Not yet.
I have it right here. But I want to see my reward before I hand it over.
Damn, you managed to survive that...
What are you saying? You wanted me to die?
My friends just wanted a meal. Fresh juicy skin off a little scavenger.
What is that supposed to mean?!
You sure took your time Strelok. Just decided to reappear after all these months, did you? Well, whatever happened to you is your own business. Anyhow, it's good to see you again.
Fang? I seem to remember your face... I heard you were dead, but Doc cleared that up for me.

Yup, I'm Fang alright. I see the amnesia is still present to a degree. Well, your noggin will settle down in due time. But enough with that - we've got serious matters to attend to. Strelok, do you remember what we were planning back a few months ago?
Doc told me the gist of it. You were to build a decoder to open up the lab beneath the Generators.
I... I... can't remember much.

We were going to try to get into the lab beneath the Generators! We thought whatever caused the Zone: blowouts, mutants, everything... was created in this lab and it still contains the key to bring everything down! I was working on assembling a decoder. I was using old technical notes I wrote way back when, to open up the lab, but couldn't find all the parts. Then a shit storm happened... you went missing and we got all split up!
Possibly in this lab is the key to turn off what is the main cause of these energy blowouts and all the madness.
I see... Yes, it's slowly coming back to me. So what do we do next?

Well, I just found the last part for this decoder device - I'll take it to Yantar, to let the Eco's look over everything. Until then, you should go and meet Ghost, who is already in the Pripyat hotel, room 26. But don't wait for my return: we don't have much time.
I see. I will go and meet Ghost then. Godspeed, brother!
Hurry brother, time is of the essence!
Yes, I'm on my way.
Was there something else?
Where did you learn all of your mechanical skills?

Self-taught - all of it. I guess it helps I know mathematics better than most of the drop outs in this cesspool. As long as you got the will and the time, anything is possible. Newton invented calculus without a stinkin' computer, right? Well, I created the ecologists' vaunted psi-helmets with just pen and paper.
You invented the psi-helmet?

Yeah, not that long ago. Sold off the blueprints to them since I didn't have the precision tools to do it myself. Asses can't be bothered to at least mention my name when they brag about it. To hell with 'em! Their payment still sits in a bank account somewhere in the Bahamas. Hah, taxpayer money at work. Y'know, when we're done with all this madness, we could bail out and live the big life. You, me, Ghost, Doc - hell, if he wants, we'll bring Guide along. Yeah, that'd be sweet...
Yeah sounds good. Watch out I just might hold you to that. OK, I must run.
How exactly did we meet?

Nothing spectacular - unlike how you met good ol' Ghost. I helped out Doc when some Merc assholes tried to claim his little swamp house for themselves. Had to crush a skull and dislocate a shoulder, but they got the message. Doc introduced us and we had a good time with drinks and such. After that, we had to deal with the pompous Merc bastards again. It was quite a spectacle. Never underestimate a modded PKM loaded with incendiary rounds... God I miss that sweet beast of a gun.
Where was Ghost around that time?
Ghost wasn't with us back then though - he came into the picture a little later. Ask him, I'm sure he'll tell you the whole thing.
OK, thanks.

Hey stalker, I need some help man! I was playing poker with the boys when these rats came in and the guys ran away all scared... little bitches! I don't have anything to kill the rats with though , can you help me get rid of them?
What's in it for me?
Oh man, I don't have much... well I do know a place where a friend of mine hid a nice stash; I can give you the coordinates if you kill all of them for me.
Sure, I'll take care of them, back in a few!
I don't have time right now, sorry.
Please I'm begging you, can you help me with the rat problem?
I'm just too busy for this, sorry.
Are all the bastards dead?
Not yet, still working on it.
Yep, all done and dusted!
Wow, thanks man, I really appreciate it. Here are the coordinates of the stash.
Pleasure doing business with you, see you around.
Are all the bastards dead?
Not yet... there are a few problems...
Yep, all done and dusted. Now if you just give me the coordinates I'll be literally running along!
Wow, thanks man, I really appreciate it. Here are the coordinates.
Yeah, take care man...
You have serious issues man, and about your friends... actually, forget that. I'm outta here!
Ahhhh, another "rat catcher"!
You... you can talk?!
Yes, not all controllers communicate telepathically, some have retained the ability to use your language.
What are you doing here creature!
That is for you to find out my friend...
I am not your friend; I won't ask again, what are you doing here?!
You just took care of a problem for me!
What?.. What are you talking about?
Go to the dead rats and see for yourself.
And what about the rats? Just some dead rats. Or...
Just take care of the rat problem and then we will talk.
OK, but I'll be back.
So, have you done the job?
Yes, now tell me what the hell this is about!
Not yet, still working on it.
Forget this, I'm outta here!
Quite something eh?
What the hell is wrong with you?!

This has been my house for years. A couple of drunkards stumble in for a game of poker and do you think I would just let them!? I don't think so! So I controlled your minds into believing they were rats.
You sick bastard! If I ever meet you again, I'll finish you off!
